New Records: England won the match by 10 wickets (with 62 balls remaining)
Key Match Events: The match was the first meeting between England and the USA with full international status
Pre-Game Insights: USA were aiming to thwart England's charge towards the semi-finals
England needed a convincing performance to ensure their title defence continued
USA had a challenging journey with recent defeats
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Kensington Oval, which has seen a 200-plus score in previous tournaments
Weather conditions were a factor with potential rainfall
Others: Sam Curran needed one more wicket to reach 50 in T20Is
